hero.title: SafeTasks is the production OS that connects projects, people, and money.
hero.subtitle: All the best of Yandu + Jobb System, rebuilt into a modern, role-based platform for film crews.
hero.note: 7-day Pro trial with limited usage. Cancel anytime.

modules.title: Everything a production needs
modules.subtitle: From pre-production to final delivery, keep every moving part in sync.

workflow.title: A workflow that mirrors real sets
workflow.subtitle: Plan, shoot, approve, and close without losing context.

access.title: Clear access for every role
access.subtitle: Owners, producers, finance, and freelancers see exactly what they need.

integrations.title: Connected to your stack
integrations.subtitle: Keep files, payments, and automation in one flow.

testimonials.title: Built with production teams
testimonials.subtitle: Designed to replace scattered sheets and fragile spreadsheets.

cta.title: Ready to run your next production on SafeTasks?
cta.subtitle: Create your company account and start the trial in minutes.

production.title: Projects and breakdowns
production.description: Scenes, characters, shooting days and call sheets linked to each production.

scheduling.title: Scheduling and crew
scheduling.description: Plan calendars, notifications, proposals and approvals in one timeline.

financials.title: Budgets and cashflow
financials.description: Clients, invoices, transactions and taxes with role-based approvals.

inventory.title: Inventory and kits
inventory.description: Track gear, maintenance, and kits tied to productions.

files.title: Files and Drive
files.description: Centralize assets with Google Drive integration and usage limits.

ai.title: AI production assist
ai.description: Script analysis, call sheet suggestions and smarter estimates.

step1.title: Pre-production
step1.description: Briefs, budgets, proposals, stakeholders and approvals.

step2.title: Production
step2.description: Call sheets, crew, locations, schedules and live updates.

step3.title: Post-production
step3.description: Invoices, payments, delivery status and financial close-out.

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Full control, billing, approvals and organization settings.

producer.title: Producer
producer.description: Creates productions, manages crews, schedules and deliverables.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Manages invoices, transactions, tax tables and approvals.

freelancer.title: Freelancer
freelancer.description: Sees only assigned projects and personal fees.

drive.title: Google Drive
drive.description: Sync folders and keep assets aligned with productions.

stripe.title: Stripe billing
stripe.description: Subscription management, webhooks and reliable status checks.

automation.title: Automation ready
automation.description: Webhooks and APIs for your existing studio stack.

one.quote: We finally have one source of truth for the show.
one.name: Production Manager

two.quote: Finance can approve without blocking the creative flow.

landing.footer: Â© 2026 SafeTasks V3. Built for audiovisual production.

items.a: Yes. Every new organization starts with a 7-day Pro trial with limited usage.
